thread.title: John Boehner Announces When House Will Vote For Speaker
thread.title_full: John Boehner Announces When House Will Vote For Speaker - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: John Boehner Announces When House Will Vote For Speaker
text: WASHINGTON, Oct 5 (Reuters) - The U.S. House of Representatives will vote on the next speaker on Oct. 29, House Speaker John Boehner announced on Monday. On Thursday, House Republicans will meet to choose their party's nominee for the post, but thespeaker is elected by the entire House of Representatives. In a statement, Boehner said that once the next speaker is elected, the Republicans will choose the rest of their party leadership team on a date to be established by the new speaker. (Reporting by Susan Cornwell; Editing by Susan Heavey) -- This feed and its contents are the property of The Huffington Post, and use is subject to our terms.
